interest_match.description: How well the itinerary matches the user's stated interests
considerations: Are attractions related to user's stated preferences?
Does it cover the types of activities mentioned?
Are there appropriate variations within the interest area?

budget_realism.description: How realistic the budget allocation is

rating_scale.1: Far exceeds budget or unrealistic pricing

considerations: Value for money of selected attractions

rating_scale.3: Average flow, workable but not optimal

considerations: Balance of activities across time slots

suitability_for_constraints.description: How well it accommodates user constraints

rating_scale.5: Excellent, thoughtful accommodation of all constraints

evaluation_prompt_templates.basic_evaluation: You are an impartial travel expert. USER PROFILE: {profile} ITINERARY: {itinerary} Rate from 1 to 5 (integers) on: interest_match, budget_realism, logistics, suitability_for_constraints. Return ONLY JSON with these fields plus a 'comment' field with brief explanation.
evaluation_prompt_templates.detailed_evaluation: You are an experienced travel planner evaluating an itinerary. USER PROFILE: {profile} CONSTRAINTS: {constraints} ITINERARY: {itinerary} Provide a detailed evaluation including: 1. Overall assessment 2. Strengths 3. Areas for improvement 4. Specific recommendations. Then provide numerical ratings (1-5) for each criterion.
evaluation_prompt_templates.comparative_evaluation: Compare these two itineraries for the same user profile. PROFILE: {profile} ITINERARY_A: {itinerary_a} ITINERARY_B: {itinerary_b} Evaluate which is better and why, then provide ratings for both.
evaluation_prompt_templates.constraint_focused: Focus specifically on how well this itinerary handles user constraints. PROFILE: {profile} (pay special attention to constraints: {constraints}) ITINERARY: {itinerary} Evaluate primarily on constraint accommodation, then provide full ratings.

comment_templates.excellent: Excellent itinerary that perfectly matches user preferences and constraints. Well-paced, budget-appropriate, and comprehensive.
comment_templates.good: Good itinerary with strong alignment to user interests. Some minor improvements possible in {area}.
comment_templates.average: Reasonable itinerary that covers basic requirements. Could be improved by {suggestions}.
comment_templates.poor: This itinerary needs significant improvement. Issues include: {issues}. Recommendations: {recommendations}.

constraint_specific.family: Family-friendly itinerary with appropriate attractions for children. Good balance of educational and fun activities.
constraint_specific.accessible: Well-considered accessible itinerary with wheelchair-friendly venues and manageable pacing.
constraint_specific.budget: Cost-effective itinerary that maximizes value within the budget. Good mix of free and paid attractions.
constraint_specific.pace: Well-paced itinerary matching the user's preferred travel speed. Good balance of activities and rest.

budget: Replace expensive attractions with similar budget options
Adjust schedule to include more cost-effective days
logistics: Adjust timing to avoid rush hours
Add more rest time between activities
interest_match: Include more attractions related to user's specific interests
Add variety within the interest area
Consider related interests that might appeal
constraints: Adjust pace to be more relaxed/intense
Consider dietary restrictions in food recommendations

when_to_give_5: Perfect alignment with all user preferences
